data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Kalinga, Philippines.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kalinga, Philippines
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Kalinga, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Kalinga.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 11,213 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Sangil people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Sangil people know you.
Father, encourage the 11,213 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Kalinga that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kalinga, Philippines has a population of 80,500.

We estimate Kalinga has 11,213 people who might know Jesus, 62,014 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 7,273 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Kalinga.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

location.name: Kalinga
